Posts.Content: Jun 15, 2016 04:56AM Scared7755 wrote: I went to the Phillip Israel center at Kennestone. I have an appointment tomorrow with Ga Breast Specialists just to get another opinion. I am trying to wrap my head around the fact that this can be beaten. Can you tell me a little about what to expect? Did you have chemo? Are you in remission?
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed. Oncologist in Ga? Scared7755 LibbyD

Posts.Content: Scared7755 wrote: ladies I was just diagnosed with breast cancer. It's too early to have all the info but Drs are thinking Stage 1a (hopefully). They don't feel any swollen lymph nodes but aren't 100% sure till they do more tests. It's invasive ductal carcinoma. I am being treated at a local breast surgeon in Marietta Ga but was wondering if anyone had oncologist recommendations. Should I try cancer center treatment of America? Md Anderson? My head is flooded with horrible thoughts of leaving my 7 month old. I can survive and beat this right? I am 36 and terrified. Dx 6/14/2016, DCIS/IDC, Right, 1cm, Stage IA, Grade 2, 0/16 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed. Oncologist in Ga? Scared7755 LibbyD
